subject: The Internet Patrol - Search the Largest Collection of US Military Records in the World and Do a Free Ancestor Search!
body:
The Internet Patrol


 The Internet Patrol
http://www.theinternetpatrol.com

Search the Largest Online Collection of US Military Records in the World and Do a Free Ancestor Search for US Military Personnel!


Looking for ancestors who may have been military personnel or want to do a military family history search?  Now you can perform a free ancestor search through the largest online collection of US military records, courtesy of Ancestry.com! 

Read more here: Search the Largest Online Collection of US Military Records in the World and Do a Free Ancestor Search for US Military Personnel!
 

Here are some amazing deals we've found on the Internet for ourselves recently:

Get gadget insurance for your cell phone, PDA and all your electronic gadgets, to protect against los or theft!  http://www.theinternetpatrol.com/get-your-stuff-back-with-stuffbak-pdas-laptops-cell-phones-protect-them-all

And check out the best collection of how to videos at http://www.LearnHowTo.TV !


Know somebody who would like to receive these alerts?  Forward this one to them and let them know
that they can sign up for free by sending email to "internetpatrol@aweber.com" with the 
word 'Subscribe' in the subject!
